review: Good but can be laggy at times. Wifi doesn't seem to connect as well as competing streaming devices.
author: tcneuen

review: Turned our bedroom TV into a smart TV and now we can watch Prime, HBO Go, etc. in our room.  Love it!  Have not had any issues.
author: Elizabeth Best "average consumer"

review: It's nice that it has its own menu, but it's terribly slow and the apps are damn near useless. I hadn't used it in a while, switched over to watch something on YouTube, and it won't send the signal anymore. Bleh. I got it on sale and still feel like I overpaid.
author: Chitown17

review: Disappointed with the loss of internet connect that occurs while watching a show.  I often have to turn off the stick and turn back on as well as wait a little while.  I do have the extender on and the TV and Fire Stick are only about 18 feet from my router.  Also not finding a lot of free content so far without being an Amazon Prime member.  I would like amazon prime if the price were half of what it is.
author: Barb

review: Love the Fire TV!  Was exactly what  I needed and arrived as promised.
author: Kindle Customer

review: Loved it, Very simple to work with.
author: Yadira I White

review: I love the fire stick. My tv has total capacity.
author: Becky Harvard
